timeline.bodyText:
I'd probably even name it "getSlimefunItem()".
Also why is this build failing?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
Very stupid things, fixed now.
The reason I didn't name it that is, this is already an ItemStack and getting the ID is getItemID. Follows the pattern of using getItem.
Personally, it should be both changed or keeping this like so.
replies.author: WalshyDev

timeline.bodyText: Nitpicky but you could also mark "SlimefunItemStack" as a link, even though its the same file...
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.message: (By the way, you know this breaks convention)
